Title: Great Camera, Except for the Lens Cover
Cons: The Lens cover after about 250 photos started to not open all the way and it can be open manual but it is a pain if you do not check to see if it is open before taking a picture and the lens gets dirty from touching it when opening it up. The picture delay is slow it can take up to about 2.5 seconds before you can take another picture.
Pros: The picture quality is excellent; I have a 1 gig memory card and can take a bunch of 30 second videos and pictures.

Title: Great camera for a great price
Cons: Batteries run relatively quickly, but I guess it's a common problem for many digital cameras and shouldn't be a consideration. It's worth it. You will need rechargable batteries anyway, so no problem at all.
Pros: Small, light weight, easy to use, a high quality camera with a lot of features. Great video recording feature with sound. It's like you have a camcorder, if you have an extra memory of 256MB-1GB. Plus, you can transfer the pictures and the video to the TV. It's amazing.
Comments: My husband is interested in professional picture taking and owns a manually controlled camera, and he is really impressed with how a digital camera of this price can have so many advanced features and a great quality. We highly recommend it.

Title: Awesome mid-range compact
Cons: The video only records at 10fps at the maximum resolution and the zoom lens assembly of the first one I got self-destructed for no apparent reason. I don't know if this is a common problem of not.
Pros: This camera is easy to use on the auto setting but also has various other modes where all kinds of things can be adjusted manually, if you're into that kind of thing. Pictures look great to me coming off of a three-year-old Fujifilm Finepix.

Title: best investment i ever made
Cons: only con, is the difficulty to focus in on an object when in full zoom
Pros: great camera, such a low price, my favorite part is all the manual settings, by using the aperature, and shutter speeds i no longer have to use a flash and can really see the beauty of a picture, and the manual focus makes it possible to take pictures with character, but if that doesnt flot your boat it also has point and shoot.
Comments: THIS CAMERA IS **GREAT** ON BATTERIES, the people that have been on here saying it eats them up do not know what they are talking about, YOU CANT PUT REGULAR BATTERIES in a digital camera.  I use the RAYOVAC 15 minute rechargables, and im getting about 200 pictures without the flash, and about 100 with the flash.

Title: Excellent Camera
Cons: the lense cover mechanism is very breakable.  My camera's lense cover is open halfway now.  have to user my finger to click it fully open.
Pros: great image quality, Auto setting is all you need.  Great for amature.  Best camera for this price.
Comments: PC can read and copy image from PSA520, but can not do reverse.  why???

Cons: Size.  It's a little big to be putting in your pocket.
Pros: Nice size screen.  Takes regular AA batteries.  The fact that it uses an SD card is great cause you can get them for dirt cheap.  Price was just right for a christmas present to the girlfriend.

Title: Great Camera
Cons: Low MP, but it will still print 8x10 photos at a great resolution (nothing larger, though).
Pros: Great - compact, very user friendly. Includes everything you need right in the box.  Can't beat the price.
Comments: Overall - great buy.

Title: Poor quality
Cons: Horrible build quality-I bought 3 of these. I never really like the picture quality which has really bad white balance The  display went bad on the first one just out of warranty and it cost more to repair than to buy another. The second one has been returned for the repair to the lens cover -- it is gone now. The newest one is OK for now, but one out of three is not good. I bought all three of these because of the reviews I read here. Research further. This is not a quality camera in my experience. I will not buy another Canon.
Pros: No one that can't be had with another brand
Comments: As others have said, I have found Canon's customer service to be second rate. I also had a rebate declined because of a qualification that was hidden in the fine print of the rebate details and not shown on the site where I purchased the products.

Cons: Takes about 5-6 seconds to take next picture and when you press the button to take picture you need to hold it for 4-5 seconds.
Pros: Excellent camera for the price.  Takes really beautiful pictures.

Title: Great Camera
Cons: Others have pointed out low battery life when using this camera, but that's true for just about all digital cameras.  Keep some spare, rechargeable AAs around and you'll be fine.
Pros: I just got this camera and have been busy taking pictures ever since.  Its great!  Easy to use, lots of features, and the pictures look fantastic.  I'm very happy with this.

Comments: As others have said, I have found Canon's customer service to be second rate. I also had a rebate declined because of a qualification that was hidden in the fine print of the rebate details and not shown on the site where I purchased the products.

Cons: Takes about 5-6 seconds to take next picture and when you press the button to take picture you need to hold it for 4-5 seconds.
Pros: Excellent camera for the price.  Takes really beautiful pictures.

Title: Great Camera
Cons: Others have pointed out low battery life when using this camera, but that's true for just about all digital cameras.  Keep some spare, rechargeable AAs around and you'll be fine.
Pros: I just got this camera and have been busy taking pictures ever since.  Its great!  Easy to use, lots of features, and the pictures look fantastic.  I'm very happy with this.
